npcMystifier.name: Turn on npc mystifier.
npcMystifier.hint: Turn on npc mystifier, renaming tokens based on their traits if Alt (configurable) is clicked when adding to scene.

npcMystifierAddRandomNumber.name: Add random number to name.
npcMystifierAddRandomNumber.hint: Turns on adding a random number when mystifying npcs.

npcMystifierFilterRarities.name: No npc rarity in the name.
npcMystifierFilterRarities.hint: Filter out rarities from the mystified name.

npcMystifierKey.name: Key to mystify
npcMystifierKey.hint: Hold this to mystify npc as it's dragged out to the scene. Note that if you choose Alt (the default) it also hides the npc.
